name: Crawling Worm - Endless Challenge
description:
Let's relive those unforgettable memory on iOS platform.
The Snake will gain credit after consuming each gold coin.
Every three coins gained will give it a new item.
Special items will earn you more gifts and rewards.
You should win as many coins as possible in each round.
When the coins reach certain numbers, a new item will be unlocked.
Altogether there are 32 special items.So gear up!
You should eat as many food as possible to enlarge yourself.
Compete with your friends on the GameCenter!
